name: Gun Force PRO: shoot for watch
name_original: Gun Force PRO: shoot for watch
description:
The heroes are now back in this PRO version with even more heroes for a buffet of gunfire!!!

Terror is cover the news. Only you have the chance to save the earth, the dog and the girl of your life.
* Play on Phone/Tablet or Watch
* TAP to shoot
* Do not miss, you'll be dead!

\\\\\\ Get this PRO version to get rid of ads and enjoy controlling more heroes //////
